title: Classifying Crypto Tokens as Securities Will Hamper Some Blockchains’ Decentralization Efforts, Bernstein Says
description: The core issue is whether countries should use securities law framed decades ago to categorize crypto tokens, without realizing the efforts of blockchain networks’ to transform existing financial systems, the report said.

title: Bitcoin's MACD Indicator Flips Bearish, Scares Crypto Twitter
description: MACD histogram is a technical indicator widely used to gauge trend strength and trend changes.

title: XRP Lawyer Acknowledges Tomorrow as a ‘Big Day’ for Crypto
description:
John E Deaton, the pro-XRP lawyer, recently shared a Twitter post inviting his 272.4k followers’ attention to the long-awaited hearings and resolutions in the US Federal Court. As a response to a recent tweet shared by Paul Grewal, the Chief Legal Officer at the crypto exchange Coinbase, Deaton asserted that this Wednesday would be a […]

title: SHIB Could Breakout Downwards Despite a $10M Accumulation
description:
Today, on-chain analyst Lookonchain reported that the largest holder of Shiba Inu (SHIB) accumulated another 1.5 trillion tokens. According to the smart money analyst, the operation occurred on two of the world’s largest exchanges— Coinbase and Binance. Usually, this sort of action implies that the whale was accounting for the long-term, especially as SHIB’s price […]

The post SHIB Could Breakout Downwards Despite a $10M Accumulation appeared first on Coin Edition.
